reference.title: Shared linked library
reference.shortdesc: When you use your sample code with a static linked library you can access the APIs directly.

refbody.section:
At the compile time you need to specify the library:gcc sample_shared.c -g -O0 -o sample_shared /usr/lib64/opencryptoki/libopencryptoki.so
The presented samples that interact with the API are based on the shared linked library.
